så här gör man:

1 gå till windows update
2 installera allt sikt han ber om
3 gå in på verktyg/hantera installerade komponeter 
4 inaktevera Windows Genuine vips så funkar det. märkte det själv i dag 050809 då jag skulle pröva det nya workaround så dom redan fixat

http://www.boingboing.net/2005/07/28/microsoft_genuine_ad.html

This enable you update your windowsupdate.

http://archives.neohapsis.com/archives/fulldisclosure/2005-08/0113.html

This enable you download file (e.g. Microsoft AntiSpyware, IE) from Microsoft.

install the Windows Genuine Advantage activex controller
then disable the Windows Genuine Advantage activex controller in IE 

works fine 4 me
Ja, du har rätt DPStudio, det funkar finemang.

Or.... Start>Control Panel>Internet Options>Programs>Manage Add-Ons>scroll down to Windows Genuine Advantage Validation Tool>Disable

Merry Christmas!

well done guys for doing theis the only thing is, you can do it much easier by going here http://www.boingboing.net/2005/07/28/microsoft_genuine_ad.html Worked first time for me and you dont have to download or install anything! (sorry to piss on your torrent)!
